overview: Loosely based on a collection of dreams, nightmares, and frantic journal entries  Hereâ€™s to the After-life follows the story of a guy, who, presumably in his final moments, embarks on an otherworldly journey to reconnect with the parts of himself he had long since forgotten, to forgive himself at his lowest, and ultimately heal himself from his loss.
title: Here's to the Afterlife
